message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500, but I think I can do better than that. How about $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $10,000 is cutting it very close to my bottom line.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $12,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit below my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $11,500, but I think I can do better than that. How about $11,000?
